sections.content:
Question:
Can an RTOS other than FreeRTOS be used?
Answer:
Yes. Renesas provides a flexible software package (FSP) to enable you to freely select an RTOS. This allows you to use the RZ/A3UL with your preferred RTOS as necessary. However, some of the middleware stack is dependent on the FreeRTOS currently, so we plan to integrate the RTOS wrappers in a future release to increase portability.
Suitable Products
RZ/A3UL
